p: 2. An analysis of signs. We begin again with useful things, but now our goal is to understand the referral-structure of such things. The referral of useful things can take a variety of forms, but we focus on the referral at work in a particular kind of useful thing: a sign. There are different kinds of signs, but they have one characteristic in common: they refer by indicating something. This will serve as our clue for understanding the structure of the things we meet in the worlds of practical meaning.
